title: Records for animal IDs: 58386531, 59003071, 59004452 (Russell County Phenix City Animal Shelter)

communications.subject: Alabama Open Records Law Request: Records for animal IDs: 58386531, 59003071, 59004452 (Russell County Phenix City Animal Shelter)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Alabama Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Records for: Bella (ID#58386531), Sampson (ID#59003071), Sandy (ID#59004452)

1) Any and all documentation and records (to include but not be limited to photos, intake/outcome dates, weight, behavioral & veterinary assessments/diagnoses/notes, veterinary visits, veterinary care, treatments/medications/supplements, disposition) for the ID numbers listed above

2) Any and all records documenting the outcome (to include but not be limited to: rescue transfer document, euthanasia certificate, investigation and/or citations, charges prepared and/or filed, outcome) of the ID numbers listed above

3) Any and all documentation and records for communications to any individual, entity/rescue or organization (to include but not be limited to written and electronic [text, email, Messenger, etc]) regarding the ID numbers listed above

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

André Natta, a citizen of Alabama, in coordination with Mimi Steger.
